appName: Fly Villa: AI World Travel & Creation
displayName: Fly Villa: AI World Travel & Creation
display_name: Fly Villa: AI World Travel & Creation
display_long_description:
* **Virtual Travel** in multiplayer on Google Earth! Go on adventures solo or in groups anywhere on Earth in 3D, plan travel, bucket lists, real estate, build on top! Minimap. 360 panos. 

* **AI Assistant:** Get hours of nonstop AI interactions included with a subscription. Learn > 30 languages, acquire new skills, get answers to tough questions. Includes AI technical support.

[media]

[media]
* **Fly supersonic!** Create unlimited fullbody avatars. Meet privately or publicly. As Admin, screen who joins your worlds.

[media]
* **Zoom from/to VR:** Villa subscribers can initiate or join a Zoom meeting from VR. Non-VR users can join and experience VR immersion via a Zoom link. Perfect for hybrid meetings.

[media]
* **Broadcast** to thousands of users in VR

[media]
* Create epic **AI Art** in VR alone or in multiplayer

[media]
* **Subscribe in-app for all features**. Join instantly or create an account once inside. **Free 7-day trial available**. Choose monthly or annual subscription. **Annual offers 33% discount + $183 Coins and AI credits** (1st time subs only)

[media]
* **Villas are 3D channels offering private conf rooms** and vast outdoor experiences. **Spawn and build with millions of 3D objects for socials, meetings, and conferences.** Choose from repos in-app or drag/drop your HQ/office/home or any obj, fbx, gltf, glb, jpeg, png, mp3, to your web account

* **Galactica Game** (in-app): **Own & develop virtual land or sell to earn Villa coins!**

[media]
* Building in 3D is fun! **Build worlds increasingly with AI including AI Art, 3D Objects, 3D soundtracks, images, VFX** - no code required

* **Proptech flythroughs**

[media]

[media]
